instructions:
PREHEAT oven to 400 degrees F.
COMBINE Macaroni and Cheese, tuna and peas in medium bowl. Transfer to 8-inch-square baking pan; top with chips and paprika.
BAKE for 25 to 30 minutes or until bubbly around edges.
title: Crunchy Tuna Mac
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package STOUFFER'S® frozen Macaroni and Cheese, defrosted
